DOC.brief_summary: Evolution of medical care for patients with cystic fibrosis appeared in recent years: prolongation of life expectancy with consequently increased comorbidities and the use of lung transplantation, systematic neonatal screening of new born since 2002, prescription of expensive new molecules or new presentation. This evolution justifies to realize an update of statistics of costs of care and to assess adherence to treatment
DOC.brief_title: Costs of Care and Adherence to Treatment for Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Patients with cystic fibrosis, Followed by one of the cystic fibrosis center of the RhôneAlpes region (pediatric and adult of Lyon and Grenoble) Affiliated to the general scheme of health insurance, And domiciled in the RhôneAlpes region. Transplanted patients
